title: Status desktop copy update

milestone.description:
## Messaging & Communities team

**1.  Fix bug and stabilise Communities and Messaging functionality**

**2.  Reduce size of community description metadata**
- better compressions, less duplication

**3. Use data sync layer (or other mechanism) to improve community description reliability**
- Every time a new user joins the community, the Control Node updates and signs the description.
- Random back off to stop it being too chatty 

**4. Continue work on profile showcase**

 

## Wallet Team

**1. Complete support for Community minted assets**

**2. Complete token visibility management screens**

**3. Continue working on WalletConnect support**

**4. Minor updates to Asset screens**

**5. Continue fixing bugs, making optimisations and keeping tech debt low**

body:

 2. Reveal a temporary QR code and Sync code
 * 3. Share that information with your new device
  Setup Syncing  
*This is best done in private. The code will grant access to your profile.|Sync a new device 
1. Log into your profile on your other device
2. Reveal a sync code by clicking “Start Syncing”. Don’t share the code with others.
3. Enter the sync code or scan the sync code on your other device. Your devices are in sync automatically

Just a reminder to whoever will be working on this task: after the string changes, run the `scripts/translationScripts/update-en-ts.py` script to regenerate the translation files
This bug should be closed as won't fix, as per discussions earlier today.  This info will be passed to the design team, and design will consider this change request.
